snippet.title: Amber Heard donates divorce settlement to charity | Daily Celebrity News | Splash TV
snippet.description:
The Children's Hospital Los Angeles has confirmed that Amber Heard did donate part of her divorce settlement to the charity after promising that she would following her split from Johnny Depp.

SUBSCRIBE NOW : https://goo.gl/JaLP0U

The Children's Hospital Los Angeles (CHLA) has confirmed that Amber Heard did donate part of her divorce settlement to the charity after promising that she would following her split from Johnny Depp.

The 31-year-old actress divorced Johnny in 2016 and won a whopping $7 million in her settlement, which she promised she would split between two charities, American Civil Liberties Union, and CHLA.

And now, CHLA have published a report for 2017 which listed "Ms. Amber Heard" on its "Honor Roll of Donors", which indicated she had donated an undisclosed amount within the bracket of $1 million to $5 million.

Amber and Johnny, released a joint statement after reaching their divorce settlement in August 2016 in which it was stated Amber would be making the charitable donation.

Good for you Amber!
